page.title: 09Employment
page.content: {Sawmill} The sawmill in Sampford Arundel has got 45 workers. It is a medium-sized sawmill and it is very useful for Sampford Arundel. At the sawmill they divide all the workers into groups. This is what the groups do: one group stacks the timber, another group cuts the timber, and some people would plane the timber. {Haywain Inn} To start with the inn was called The Red Ball Inn but 7 years ago it changed its name to The Haywain Inn. At the inn there are five people working. It is busy during the week but it is especially busy at weekends. The inn opens at 11 a.m. and closes at 2.30 p.m. Then the workers have a break, and it opens again at 5.30 p.m.and closes again at 11 p.m.
